name: Flight Rising: Highlight Boss Familiars
description: Highlights boss familiars with a rainbow outline for easy identification
css:

img[src$='/familiar/23842.png'],
img[src$='/familiar/23844.png'],

img[src$='/familiar/21430.png'],

img[src$='/familiar/10233.png'],

img[src$='/familiar/13428.png'],

img[src$='/familiar/16912.png'],
img[src$='/familiar/16911.png'],
img[src$='/familiar/16481.png'],

    #grad { 
        background-image: linear-gradient(-170deg, IndianRed,LightSalmon,LemonChiffon,LightGreen,CornflowerBlue,MediumPurple,violet);
        border-radius: 5px !important;
      }
}
